TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. Here's one of mine - it's almost all used up though

I wish to understand whale.

Granted. Here's one of mine - it's almost all used up though

I wish to understand whale.

Granted. You have a book on Whales, but it's filled with nothing but arguments about planes and conveyor belts.

I wish Blender and Unity didn't cook my brain cells.

Granted. Your brain cells are instead blended and united.

I wish for a terrain baker.

Granted,

INTRODUCING THE NEW TERRAIN BAKER 5000.

IT BAKES YOUR CAKE LIKE THERE'S NO TOMORROW!!!

I wish for my wish to be corrupted.

No.

I wish for world peace

Granted, But a alien race comes by and screw stuff up. Kerbal style.

I wish for a grumpy cat book

granted it gets old relly fast

i wish for an happy face

Granted. But it looks just like your grandmother who died a few years ago. Every time you look at it you have thoughts of suicide. Eventually you give in.

I want a less-morbid mind.
granted, but now you can't do math.

Granted, but now you can't wish for anything.

I wish I could math.

Granted but now your morbid

i wish for a pet portal turret with no bullets

Gratned - it buys bullets and kills you with them for not letting it have bullets.

I wish i wasn't subscribed to this thread.

Granted-you subscribed to a mechjeb flamewar thread

I wish today wasn't my science exam.

Granted. You instead have an exam in every class EXCEPT science. And they will count as your entire grade this year, nothing else matters. I wish that NASA would release a paper on the EMDrive so that people would stop fussing about it.

Granted. Controversy.

I wish for technology to start being used the right way. Today, it's... just awful.

Granted, but they just use it wrong after a month anyway...

I wish for a large dinosaur, of the awesome kind.

Granted. The awesomeness of it explodes your mind. And everyone who sees it. It is now responsible for genocide of all of humanity. Good job.

I wish for another cat.

You get a cat, But its in a box and you shake it and its either dead or alive.

I wish for a space station
Granted there's a leak somewhere on it and you have Ã­Â Â½Ã­Â¹Å  seconds till it explodes

ERROR. GRANTING PROCESSOR = NaN. INSERT BOOT DISC...

DISC NOT FOUND. WISHING CANNOT BE FULFILLED. C:/ run creativity application.

I wish my voice didn't get so loud when that happens.

granted it gets so mono tone that nobody can listen to you without falling asleep in 0.000000000000000000001 seconds

i wish for a pet carbon atom

Granted, but it is a radioactive isotope of carbon, so it dissipates and is no longer your pet carbon atom.

I wish for more sleep.

Granted, but now you only have roughly eight hours a day with which to not be asleep.

I wish for less rehearsals...

Granted, you now have less frequent rehearsals, but each one lasts 48 hours.

I wish it wasn't so cold in this classroom. (oh boy i see where this one is going)

Granted but now the class room is just the perfect tempututre for you to fall asleep (did you see that coming?)

i wish for 200Ã‚Â¥
